metadata.description:
I started Say You’re Mine on a cold “winter” night in LA a few years ago with some friends. We were chatting and hanging around at a session that was supposed to be wrapping up. I remember sitting on the floor near the little studio heater and listening to Adam, an amazing producer and friend, play the guitar loop. It didn’t take long for me to know where I wanted to go with the melody and lyrics. I had been writing a lot of angsty songs around that time and wanted to change the messaging, so I REALLY changed it up and started singing about love and rainbows… Check ⎷ 
But the second I started singing, I thought about my husband. There’s so much that we have been through together and I can feel our connection energetically. As we continued to write I really wanted to hone on the gentle love that is just one part of my intricate and beautiful relationship. A soft side that doesn’t rush, is patient, understanding, and sees the light in my lover. This song I dedicate to Scorch. Who will you dedicate it to to? 

Songwriters// Caly Bevier & Kayla Blackmon
Producer// Adam Kapit

lyrics.text:
I can see your 
Colors like a rainbow 
Feel you with my eyes closed 
Pull me in 
Feels like floating 
I keep losing focus
Im high off your potion
Say you’re mine
Say You’re mine

No shoes, it's 30 degrees

You’re the oxygen I need 
You keep me on my feet 

I can’t go another minute
Without telling you I care cuz I do 
Loving you seems possible 
The more it grow

Even flowers let me know that

they Take time

If it takes time 
We don’t have to rush we have all night

Pull me in

Even though you’re shy

Imma spend the night with ya 
I can see your light 
Even when you hide 
Im just tryna shine with ya 
Hold my hand tonight 
You can feel the vibe
I’m just tryna ride with ya 
I got something to say if that’s alright…
Get it off my chest and out my mind 

I can see your 
Colors like a rainbow 
Feel you with my eyes closed 
Pull me in 
Feels like floating 
I keep losing focus
I’m high off your potion
Say you’re mine

Say you’re mine
Say you’re mine <3
